term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - chemi-ionization in mass spectrometry
term.title: chemi-ionization

item.text: This refers to a process whereby gaseous molecules are ionized when they interact with other internally excited gaseous molecules or molecular moieties. Chemi-ionization and chemical ionization are two terms which should not be used interchangeably.

item.title: chemical ionization (in mass spectrometry) (in mass spectrometry)
chemical ionization (in mass spectrometry) (in mass spectrometry)
